<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Impressive Performance](/Feats.aspx?ID=793) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 262 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

Your performances inspire admiration and win you fans. You can Make an Impression using Performance instead of Diplomacy.

<title level="2">Impressive Performance leads to...</title>
[Gladiator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1976)
name: Impressive Performance
